TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Hrung, title = Hrung, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hrung} }

S.FORM: == Hrung == u sulit nu Hulam: 哈崙台部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Taichung a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Hrung. u kasalumaluma' nu Hrung sa, 231 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 553 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 230 ku tademaw, pakalatu 42%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 323 ku tademaw, pakalatu 58%. u kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 38%, Pangcah(Amis) 1%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 1%, zumazuma 1%. caykaw nu Sakizayaay a niyazu', u Tayal(Tayal) a niyazu' kuyni. u Tayal(Tayal) sananay, cayay katalakaw ku uzip, sangulan ku tatayna, salengacay ku banges, mabana miadupay. u Yincumin a tademaw tu, u Tayal a cidekay duut ku tademaw. u luma' nu Tayal i buyubuyuan. u Tayan(Tayal) a niyazu' u Tayan(Tayal) a niyazu' kuyni, katuud ku Tayan(Tayal) a tademaw itini. u zuma a tademaw sa u Pangcah(Amis), u Yuwatan(Bunun), inayi' tu ku zuma a cidakay itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052)

== Hrong == o solit no Holam: 哈崙台部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Taichong a kowan ko niyazo' no Hrong. o kasalomaloma' no Hrong sa, 231 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 553 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 230 ko tademaw, pakalato 42%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 323 ko tademaw, pakalato 58%. o kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 38%, Pangcah(Amis) 1%, Yowatan(Bonon) 1%, zomazoma 1%. caykaw no Sakizayaay a niyazo', o Tayal(Tayal) a niyazo' koyni. o Tayal(Tayal) sananay, cayay katalakaw ko ozip, sangolan ko tatayna, salengacay ko banges, mabana miadopay. o Yincomin a tademaw to, o Tayal a cidekay doot ko tademaw. o loma' no Tayal i boyoboyoan. o Tayan(Tayal) a niyazo' o Tayan(Tayal) a niyazo' koyni, katood ko Tayan(Tayal) a tademaw itini. o zoma a tademaw sa o Pangcah(Amis), o Yowatan(Bonon), inayi' to ko zoma a cidakay itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihcan 11 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052)
